content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

  1. Introduction Welcome to Prepzone Logistics (“Company,” “we,” “our,” or “us”). Your privacy is important to us, and this Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website https://prepzonelogistics.com and use our services.
  2. Information We Collect We collect the following types of information:
  • Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
  • Vehicle Information: Make, model, year, and other relevant details.
  • Payment Information: When necessary, we collect billing details for transactions.
  • Usage Data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on our website.
  • Contact Form Data: When you fill out our contact form, we collect the information you provide, including your name, email, phone number, and any other details you submit.
  1. How We Use Your Information We use your information to:
  • Provide and manage our vehicle transport brokerage services.
  • Communicate with you regarding inquiries, quotes, and transactions.
  • Improve our website and services based on usage patterns.
  • Comply with legal requirements and protect against fraud.
  • Conduct email and SMS marketing with your approval, as indicated by the checkbox on our contact form.
  1. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal data. However, we may share it with:
  • Service Providers: Third-party carriers, payment processors, and other service providers assisting in our operations.
  • Legal Authorities: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety.
  1. Data Security We implement security measures to protect your data, but no method is 100% secure. By using our website, you acknowledge and accept this risk.
  2. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
  3. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to:
  • Access, update, or delete your personal information.
  • Opt out of marketing communications.
  • Restrict the processing of your data under certain circumstances.
  1. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices, so please review their policies separately.
  2. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
  3. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Prepzone Logistics
    info@prepzonelogistics.com
    +1 713 428 2099
    13715 STAFFORD RD STE C, STAFFORD, TX 77477

By using our website, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy
